bibl.title: The Audience of the Ancient Novels.
bibl.note: Part of a doctoral thesis. Examines the question of literacy and readership. See pp. 72-73: the outward appearance of the novel papyri.

bibl.title: Groningen Colloquia on the Novel. Volume I

bibl.seg: Wesseling Berber, The Audience of the Ancient Novels.
Heinz Hofmann (Ed.), Groningen Colloquia on the Novel. Volume I (Groningen, 1988) pp. 67-79.
Part of a doctoral thesis. Examines the question of literacy and readership. See pp. 72-73: the outward appearance of the novel papyri.
